synopsis.text:
Those who survived a mysterious power outage in Tokyo, now a lawless city, found themselves in need of protection from the rampant mob. Enter 'Links,' a group of young individuals with extraordinary abilities, who emerged as the city's saviors. Among these heroes, a performance group called 'Crown' gained widespread support, especially among the youth. Hallelujah and Akatsuki, two orphans who grew up together, discover their own Link abilities and join Crown to protect the people of Tokyo daily. However, internal conflict arises within Crown regarding the government's plans for a new Parliament building in the isolated city and the use of their unique powers.

This anime marks the first 'Interactive Anime' in the Monster Strike franchise, allowing viewers to choose between two options that will alter the final 10 minutes of the show.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
